TextLibrary.Text: The Solenite? Excellent, my little friend, you've done well.
The Solenite? Excellent, my little friend, you've done well.
Yes! Now you answer our questions.
Yes! Now you answer our questions.
Where do Soulless Ones come from? Where do they hide? What system? Tell us!
Where do Soulless Ones come from? Where do they hide? What system? Tell us!
I don't know the system exactly. It is somewhere beyond Acheron on the Gehenna Rim. They are building something out there. Something you can't see.
I don't know the system exactly. It is somewhere beyond Acheron on the Gehenna Rim. They are building something out there. Something you can't see.

There are no better words to describe it, my little friend. But if you are seeking answers, I suggest you go to Acheron Prime. It is a planet stranger than the Soulless, and one they keep well clear of.

There are no better words to describe it, my little friend. But if you are seeking answers, I suggest you go to Acheron Prime. It is a planet stranger than the Soulless, and one they keep well clear of.
